name: @enthropic/platform
description: Enthropic Trading Platform - Enterprise Microservices Trading System

scripts.install:services: npm run install:auth && npm run install:risk && npm run install:nats-gateway && npm run install:dashboard
scripts.build:all: npm run build:auth && npm run build:risk && npm run build:nats-gateway && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:execution
scripts.dev:strategy: cd apps/strategy-service && poetry run python -m src.main
scripts.test:all: npm run test:auth && npm run test:risk && npm run test:execution && npm run test:strategy
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:risk && npm run lint:nats-gateway
scripts.format:all: npm run format:ts && npm run format:rust && npm run format:python
scripts.format:python: cd apps/strategy-service && poetry run black src tests
scripts.infra:up: docker compose up -d postgres redis nats jaeger prometheus grafana
scripts.infra:down: docker compose stop postgres redis nats jaeger prometheus grafana
scripts.services:up: docker compose up -d auth-service execution-core risk-service strategy-service nats-gateway dashboard
scripts.services:down: docker compose stop auth-service execution-core risk-service strategy-service nats-gateway dashboard
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run prisma:generate:auth && npm run prisma:generate:risk
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run prisma:migrate:auth && npm run prisma:migrate:risk
scripts.prisma:migrate:auth: cd apps/auth-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:risk: cd apps/risk-service && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.health:check: curl http://localhost:3002/health && curl http://localhost:9100/health && curl http://localhost:3003/health && curl http://localhost:8000/health

author: Enthropic Team
